patthana16.67:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.67:1.1_0: A cause of mental desire and lust doesn’t give rise to the teachings.
patthana16.67:1.1_1: A cause of mental desire and lust doesn’t give rise to the thought of mental desire and lust for it.
patthana16.67:1.1_2: Attacking a person whose teachings doesn’t escape from mental desire, mental desire and greed for the instruction. They don’t arise.
